小红帽.html.title: 小红帽的故事
小红帽.html.body: 小红帽的故事 有的时候，GitBook 会自带一些你不需要的样式，例如侧边栏的 由 GitBook 提供支持 等，我们可以通过设置 CSS ABC 来让它隐藏掉 This text is highlighted ! This text is highlighted with markdown! This text is highlighted in green! This text is highlighted in red! This text is highlighted with a custom color!

卖火柴的小女孩.html.title: 卖火柴的小女孩
卖火柴的小女孩.html.body: 下面那组“弹幕”的读音是正确的? Dàn mù Tán mù 蛋木 珍惜生命，远离香烟 Is it quiz? Yes No This is multiple dropdown quiz, in each dropdown select a correct number corresponding to the dropdown's order First Second Third Fourth First Second Third Fourth First Second Third Fourth First Second Third Fourth var fc=function(){var globalWidth=document.body.clientWidth-32;var value1Width=globalWidth;var value1=(document.getElementsByName("qq-d248c65e4d4b826a0ca09c577eb0f628d0b20e029089d0b5776b19f712bc9660"))[0];if(value1Width>760){value1Width=760;};value1.style.width=value1Width+"px";value1.style.height=(428/760)*value1Width+"px";};var oneSecond=1000*2;setInterval(fc,oneSecond);
